top_rare_diseases.description: A long-term condition where the kidneys gradually lose their function.
top_rare_diseases.overview: CKD is characterized by a gradual loss of kidney function over time, leading to complications like hypertension, edema, and uremia.
top_rare_diseases.clinical_significance: CKD can progress to end-stage renal disease, requiring dialysis or transplant.
top_rare_diseases.causes: Diabetes, hypertension, glomerulonephritis, polycystic kidney disease.
top_rare_diseases.diagnosis: Urine tests, blood tests, imaging, kidney biopsy.
top_rare_diseases.treatment: Lifestyle modifications, medications (ACE inhibitors, ARBs), dialysis, transplant.
clinical_trials: Study of SGLT2 Inhibitors in CKD

top_rare_diseases.description: A collection of symptoms due to kidney damage, particularly to the glomeruli.
top_rare_diseases.overview: Characterized by severe proteinuria, hypoalbuminemia, hyperlipidemia, and edema.
top_rare_diseases.clinical_significance: Increased risk of infections, thrombosis, and progression to CKD.
top_rare_diseases.causes: Minimal Change Disease, FSGS, membranous nephropathy, lupus nephritis.
top_rare_diseases.diagnosis: Urine protein-to-creatinine ratio, blood tests, kidney biopsy.
clinical_trials: Trial of Rituximab in Nephrotic Syndrome

top_rare_diseases.description: Inflammation of the glomeruli, the filtering units of the kidneys.
top_rare_diseases.overview: Can be acute or chronic, leading to kidney dysfunction.
top_rare_diseases.clinical_significance: Can progress to CKD or end-stage renal disease.
top_rare_diseases.diagnosis: Urine analysis, blood tests, kidney biopsy.
top_rare_diseases.treatment: Depends on type; may include immunosuppressants, antibiotics.
clinical_trials: Study of Azathioprine in IgA Nephropathy
Trial of IVIG for Infectious GN

top_rare_diseases.description: An autoimmune disease causing thickening of kidney glomeruli membranes.
top_rare_diseases.overview: Leading cause of nephrotic syndrome in adults, often idiopathic.
top_rare_diseases.clinical_significance: Risk of progression to CKD and thrombotic events.
top_rare_diseases.diagnosis: Urine analysis, blood tests, kidney biopsy.
clinical_trials: Trial of Tacrolimus in Membranous Nephropathy

top_rare_diseases.description: Autoimmune disease causing IgA deposits in the kidneys.
top_rare_diseases.overview: Most common cause of kidney disease worldwide, often presenting with hematuria.
top_rare_diseases.clinical_significance: Can progress to CKD and end-stage renal disease.
top_rare_diseases.causes: Genetic predisposition, environmental triggers, dysregulation of IgA.
top_rare_diseases.diagnosis: Urine analysis, blood tests, kidney biopsy.
clinical_trials: Study of Leflunomide in IgA Nephropathy
